name: ci-project-one
description: A static (front-end only) website for an 80s inspired cinematic synth-pop band from California.
author: Vilius Dzemyda <hello@viliusdzemyda.com>

scripts.build:sass: node-sass --output-style expanded scss/main.scss -o css && node-sass --output-style compact scss/bootstrap-custom.scss -o css
